script:module:
option explicit
'dim i,j as integer dim SkillName(8) as string dim SkillColorTag(7) as string dim SFFlag as boolean
global const _SkillFlawRow = 27
const _SkillCardRow = 57 const _MaxSkillCardsInHand = 20 const _MaxSkillCardsInDestiny = 24 ' 21 is the basic max with Complex Destiny and Revelations, 3 more in case of discarded Treachery.
const _SkillDiscardRow = 100 const _SkillStatusLocRow = 28 const _SkillPlayerNameRow =29 const _CardDrawRow = 30 const _PlayerHandRow = 32
const _DestinyCol = 6 const _DestinyRow = 2 global const _DestinyPlayerID = 8
const _SkillCheckCol = 7 const _SkillCheckRow = 2
const _SkillCntBase = 21 const _SkillCntPegasus = 5 const _SkillCntExodus = 4 const _SkillCntDaybreak = 5 const _SkillCntRevelations = 5 const _MaxSkillCnt = _SkillCntBase + _SkillCntPegasus + _SkillCntExodus + _SkillCntDaybreak + _SkillCntRevelations
const _SkillCardCntCol = 2 const _SkillCardCntRow = 17
const _HandCntCol = 0 const _HandCntRow = 17
const _SkillCheckHeaderRow = 1 const _SkillCheckResearchCol = 12 const _SkillCheckTreacheryCol = 13 const _SkillCheckValueCol = 15
const _SkillCheckFlagsRow = 24 const _SkillCheckCommitteeCol = 8 const _SkillCheckOrderCol = 9 const _SkillCheckInspirationalCol = 9 const _SkillCheckChanceCol = 10 const _SkillCheckGutsCol = 10 const _SkillCheckFixCol = 12 const _SkillCheckRecklessCol = 13 const _SkillCheckTypeCol = 7
const _SkillCheckTriggeredRow = 25 const _SkillCheckTriggerConsequenceCol = 14 const _SkillCheckTriggerRecklessCol = 11
const _SkillColorTagRow = 143
global const _SkillSetHand = 0 const _SkillSetDeck = 1 const _SkillSetDiscard = 2 const _SkillSetDestiny = 3
const _PlayerDrawnRow = 147 const _SkillCheckNeedsRow = 154 const _DieRollNeedsRow = _SkillCheckNeedsRow + 1
global const _SkillIDPolitics = 1 global const _SkillIDMin = _SkillIDPolitics global const _SkillIDLeadership = 2 global const _SkillIDTactics = 3 global const _SkillIDPiloting = 4 global const _SkillIDEngineering = 5 global const _SkillIDBaseMax = _SkillIDEngineering global const _SkillIDTreachery = 6 global const _SkillIDFaith = 7 global const _SkillIDMax = _SkillIDFaith const _SkillIDDestiny = 8
dim SkillSheet, SkillForm As Object
sub GetSF if SFFlag then exit sub end if
SFFlag = true SkillSheet= ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Skill Cards") SkillForm = SkillSheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("DealCards") SkillName= Array("","Politics","Leadership","Tactics","Piloting","Engineering","Treachery","Faith","Destiny") Randomize end sub 'GetSF
function SkillDeckSize as integer dim decksize as integer
decksize = _SkillCntBase if GameTypeIsPegasus() then decksize = decksize + _SkillCntPegasus end if if GameTypeIsExodus() then decksize = decksize + _SkillCntExodus end if if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then decksize = decksize + _SkillCntDaybreak end if if GameTypeIsRevelations() then decksize = decksize + _SkillCntRevelations end if SkillDeckSize = decksize end function 'SkillDeckSize
function GetSkillSetCol (whichset as integer, setID as integer)
select case whichset case _SkillSetHand GetSkillSetCol = GetPlayerCol(setID)
case _SkillSetDeck, _SkillSetDiscard GetSkillSetCol = GetSkillCol(setID)
case _SkillSetDestiny GetSkillSetCol = _DestinyCol end select
end function 'GetSkillSetCol
function GetSkillSetRow (whichset as integer, setID as integer)
select case whichset case _SkillSetHand GetSkillSetRow = _PlayerHandRow
case _SkillSetDeck GetSkillSetRow = _SkillCardRow
case _SkillSetDiscard GetSkillSetRow = _SkillDiscardRow
case _SkillSetDestiny GetSkillSetRow = _DestinyRow end select end function 'GetSkillSetRow
function MaxCardCnt (whichset as integer)
if whichset = _SkillSetHand then MaxCardCnt = _MaxSkillCardsInHand elseif whichset = _SkillSetDestiny then MaxCardCnt = _MaxSkillCardsInDestiny else '_SkillSetDeck, _SkillSetDiscard MaxCardCnt = _MaxSkillCnt end if end function 'MaxCardCnt
'This is called from Initialize_SkillCards after all the skill cards have been put in the decks. ' based on the game type/expansion, it will ' -make sure all the correct cards are in based on the gametype/expansion ' -simply delete ALL skill cards and then repopulate ' -mask areas that are not needed ' -hide rows that are unnecessary to make the tab cleaner
sub Configure_SkillCards dim skillid, maxcards, i, playerID as integer dim curcol, currow as integer dim cardset as variant GetSF
'First clear all the skill cards DiscardSkillCheckCards
' Clear Player hands. for playerid = 1 to 7 do while GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetHand,playerID) <> "" loop
' Clear drawn cards stats. for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(playerid), _PlayerDrawnRow + skillID).string = "" next skillID SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillSetCol(_SkillSetHand, playerID), _SkillFlawRow).CellBackColor = _white next playerid
' Clear decks and discards. for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax do while GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetDiscard, skillID) <> "" loop do while GetSkillCardFrom (_SkillSetDeck, skillID) <> "" loop next skillID
' Clear Destiny do while GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetDestiny,0) <> "" loop
' now repopulate from reference maxcards = 0 for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax curcol = GetSkillCol(skillID)
cardset = GetFullSkillCardSet (SkillName(SkillID)) if cardset(0) > maxcards then maxcards = cardset(0) end if
for currow = _SkillCardRow to _SkillCardRow + cardset(0) - 1 AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDeck, SkillColorL(skillID) & cardset(currow - _SkillCardRow + 1) & SkillColorR(skillID) next currow next skillID
' If we're not using Treachery, blank out the deck curcol= GetSkillCol(_SkillIDTreachery) for currow = _SkillCardRow to _SkillCardRow + _MaxSkillCnt - 1 if GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow).CellBackColor = _white SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow+(_SkillDiscardRow -_SkillCardRow )).CellBackColor = _ltgrey else SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow).CellBackColor = _grey SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow+(_SkillDiscardRow -_SkillCardRow )).CellBackColor = _grey end if next currow
' If we're not using Faith, blank out the deck curcol= GetSkillCol(_SkillIDFaith) for currow = _SkillCardRow to _SkillCardRow + _MaxSkillCnt - 1 if GameTypeIsRevelations() then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow).CellBackColor = _white SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow+(_SkillDiscardRow -_SkillCardRow )).CellBackColor = _ltgrey else SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow).CellBackColor = _grey SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(curcol,currow+(_SkillDiscardRow -_SkillCardRow )).CellBackColor = _grey end if next currow
' Hide any rows we don't need for currow = 1 to _MaxSkillCnt if currow <= maxcards then SkillSheet.Rows(_SkillCardRow + currow).IsVisible = TRUE SkillSheet.Rows(_SkillDiscardRow + currow).IsVisible = TRUE else SkillSheet.Rows(_SkillCardRow + currow).IsVisible = FALSE SkillSheet.Rows(_SkillDiscardRow + currow).IsVisible = FALSE end if next currow
' Blank out the card count rows for the missing decks, too. for i = 0 to 2 if GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + i,_SkillCardCntRow + _SkillIDTreachery).CellBackColor = _white else SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + i,_SkillCardCntRow + _SkillIDTreachery).CellBackColor = _grey end if if GameTypeIsRevelations() then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + i,_SkillCardCntRow + _SkillIDFaith).CellBackColor = _white else SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + i,_SkillCardCntRow + _SkillIDFaith).CellBackColor = _grey end if next i end sub 'Configure_SkillCards
function SkillColorR (skillID as integer) as string if ucase(Left(SkillColorL(skillID),6)) = "[COLOR" then SkillColorR="[/color]" else SkillColorR="}" & left(SkillColorL(skillID),1) end if end function
function SkillColorL (skillID as integer) as string dim i as integer if SkillColorTag(_SkillIDMin) = "" then ' fill the array for i = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax SkillColorTag(i) = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(i), _SkillColorTagRow).string next i end if SkillColorL = SkillColorTag(skillID) end function
function SkillStrFromText (cardtext as string) as integer SkillStrFromText= val(mid(cardtext, len(SkillColorL(SkillIDFromText(cardtext)))+1,1)) end function
function SkillCardFromText (cardtext as string) as string SkillCardFromText= mid(stripcolor(cardtext),5) end function
function GetPlayerCol (playerID as integer) as integer if playerID <> _DestinyPlayerID then GetPlayerCol = playerID - 1 else GetPlayerCol = _DestinyCol end if end function
function GetSkillCol (skillID as integer) as integer GetSkillCol = skillID - 1 end function
function StripColor (skillstr as string) as string dim offsetL, offsetR as integer offsetL = instr(skillstr,"]") offsetR = 8 if offsetL = 0 then offsetL = instr(skillstr,"{") offsetR = 2 end if StripColor = mid(skillstr,offsetL+1, len(skillstr) - offsetL - offsetR) end function
function SkillColorDisp (skillID as integer) as variant SkillColorDisp = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor end function
sub ReformatSkillCard (srccol, srcrow) dim skillID as integer dim oldstr, newstr as string
oldstr=SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol, srcrow).string skillID=SkillIDFromText(oldstr) SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol, srcrow).string = SkillColorL(skillID) & StripColor(oldstr) & SkillColorR(skillID) SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol, srcrow).charcolor = SkillColorDisp(skillID) end sub
sub ResetSkillCardColors dim skillID, cardno, playerID, rtncd as integer
rtncd=MsgBox("Reset the color tags and display colors for the skill cards?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if GetSF
' hands first for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() cardno=0 do until SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(playerID),_PlayerHandRow + cardno).string = "" ReformatSkillCard GetPlayerCol(playerID), _PlayerHandRow + cardno cardno=cardno+1 loop next playerID
for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax ' skill deck for cardno = _SkillCardRow to _SkillCardRow + _MaxSkillCnt - 1 if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID),cardno).string <> "" then ReformatSkillCard GetSkillCol(skillID), cardno end if next cardno
' discard pile for cardno = _SkillDiscardRow to _SkillDiscardRow + _MaxSkillCnt - 1 if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID),cardno).string <> "" then ReformatSkillCard GetSkillCol(skillID), cardno end if next cardno
'reset the colors of the skill card column headers SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID),_SkillCardRow - 1).charcolor = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID),_SkillDiscardRow - 1).charcolor = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor next skillID
' destiny for cardno = _DestinyRow to _DestinyRow + _MaxSkillCardsInDestiny if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_DestinyCol, cardno).string <> "" then ReformatSkillCard _DestinyCol, cardno end if next cardno
' skill check cardno = 0 do until SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckCol,_SkillCheckRow + cardno).string = "" ReformatSkillCard _SkillCheckCol, _SkillCheckRow + cardno cardno=cardno+1 loop
'reset the colors of the skill card count section for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol, _SkillCardCntRow + SkillID).charcolor = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + 1, _SkillCardCntRow + SkillID).charcolor = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + 2, _SkillCardCntRow + SkillID).charcolor = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillCol(skillID), _SkillColorTagRow).charcolor next skillID
end sub
function SkillCardCnt (skillID as integer) as integer GetSF SkillCardCnt = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCardCntCol + 1, _SkillCardCntRow + SkillID).value end function
function HandCardCnt (playerID as integer) as integer GetSF if playerID = _DestinyPlayerID then HandCardCnt = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(_HandCntCol + 3, _HandCntRow + 8).value else HandCardCnt = Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(_HandCntCol + 1, _HandCntRow + playerID).value end if end function
'CardInHand returns the text of the 'cardNo' card in 'playerID's hand function CardInHand (playerID as integer, cardNo as integer, optional stripped) as string dim handrow as integer
if cardNo = 0 or HandCardCnt(playerID) = 0 then CardInHand = "" exit function end if if playerID = _DestinyPlayerID then handrow = _DestinyRow else handrow = _PlayerHandRow end if if IsMissing(stripped) then CardInHand =SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(playerID), handrow + cardNo - 1).string else CardInHand =StripColor(SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(playerID), handrow + cardNo - 1).string) end if
end function
function IsSkillCheckClear() as boolean GetSF IsSkillCheckClear = (SkillForm.getByName("btnSkillCheckClear").enabled = FALSE) end function
sub Populate_Skills dim Ctl_Cards as object dim selectlist() as string dim skilllst(7) as string dim prevsel, srccol,i as integer
GetSF Ctl_Cards = SkillForm.getByName("lstSkillDecks")
selectlist=Ctl_Cards.SelectedItems()
for i = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDBaseMax skilllst(i) = skillname(i) & " (" & SkillCardCnt(i) & ")" next i if GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then skilllst(_SkillIDTreachery) = skillname(_SkillIDTreachery) & " (" & SkillCardCnt(_SkillIDTreachery) & ")" end if if GameTypeIsRevelations() then skilllst(_SkillIDFaith) = skillname(_SkillIDFaith) & " (" & SkillCardCnt(_SkillIDFaith) & ")" end if
Ctl_Cards.StringItemList = skilllst() Ctl_cards.SelectedItems = selectlist end sub 'Populate_Skills
Sub DealSelectedCard dim srcskill, destplayer as integer srcskill = GetSelected(_ListSkillDecks) if srcskill = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a skill deck." exit sub end if
destplayer = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if destplayer < 1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
DealCard(destplayer, srcskill) end sub
Sub DealCard(destplayer as integer, srcskill as integer) dim srccol,srcrow,destcol,destrow as integer ' dim srcskill, destplayer as integer dim cardtxt as string
GetSF ' srcskill = GetSelected(_ListSkillDecks) ' if srcskill = -1 then ' MsgBox "Please select a skill deck." ' exit sub ' end if
' destplayer = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) ' if destplayer < 1 then ' MsgBox "Please select a player." ' exit sub ' end if
SkillForm.getByName("btnDeal").enabled = FALSE cardtxt = GetSkillCardFrom( _SkillSetDeck, srcskill)
if IsPlayerDestiny(destplayer) then 'we're manipulating destiny, so the rules change a bit. +== AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDestiny, cardtxt else AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetHand, cardtxt, destplayer Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(destPlayer), _PlayerDrawnRow + srcskill).string = "X" end if
LogThis GetPlayerName(Destplayer) & " receives " & cardtxt
if SkillCardCnt(srcskill) = 0 then Msgbox "Time to reshuffle the " & skillname(srcskill) & " deck!" PrepSkillDeck srcskill ShuffleASkillDeck srcskill else CompressSkillCards _SkillSetDeck, srcskill end if
Populate_Skills Populate_Handlist SkillForm.getByName("btnDeal").enabled = TRUE End Sub 'DealCard
function MaxSkillCardsInDestiny as integer dim maxskill as integer GetSF
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then maxSkill = _SkillIDFaith ' Includes Treachery and Faith elseif GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then maxSkill = _SkillIDTreachery ' Includes Treachery else maxSkill = _SkillIDBaseMax end if
if VariantComplexDestiny() then MaxSkillCardsInDestiny = maxskill * 3 else MaxSkillCardsInDestiny = maxskill * 2 end if
end function
sub DealDestiny dim skillID, maxskill, maxdestsize, i as integer dim cardtxt as string
GetSF
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then maxSkill = _SkillIDFaith ' Includes Treachery and Faith elseif GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then maxSkill = _SkillIDTreachery ' Includes Treachery else maxSkill = _SkillIDBaseMax end if
do while SkillCardCnt(_SkillIDDestiny) < MaxSkillCardsInDestiny() for skillID = _SkillIDMin to maxskill AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDestiny, GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetDeck, skillID) if SkillCardCnt(skillID) = 0 then MsgBox SkillName(skillID) & " deck is empty: Shuffling" PrepSkillDeck skillID ShuffleASkillDeck skillID end if CompressSkillCards _SkillSetDeck, skillID next skillID loop CompressSkillCards _SkillSetDestiny, 0 ShuffleASkillDeck _SkillIDDestiny end sub 'DealDestiny
'PrepSkillDeck moves everything from the discard back into the skill deck so that it can be reshuffled in sub PrepSkillDeck (skillID as integer) dim curcol, srcrow, currow as integer dim cardtxt as string GetSF
cardtxt = GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetDiscard, skillID) do until cardtxt = "" AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDeck, cardtxt cardtxt = GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetDiscard, skillID) loop end sub 'PrepSkillDeck
'UndealSkill takes a skill card from a players hand, puts it back into the skill deck, and reshuffles. sub UndealSkill dim player, skillID, srccol, srcrow, destcol, destrow, cardno, rtncd as integer dim cardtext as string
GetSF player = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if player = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a player.",0,"Undeal a Card" exit sub end if
cardNo= GetSelected(_ListSkillCards) if cardNo = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a card to undeal.",0,"Undeal a Card" exit sub end if
cardtext=CardInHand(player, cardNo) rtncd=MsgBox("Do you want to take the card '" & cardtext & "' back from " & GetPlayerName(player) & "'s hand and put it into the skill deck and reshuffle?",4,"Undeal a Card")
if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDeck, GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetHand, player, cardNo)
CompressSkillCards _SkillSetHand, player ShuffleASkillDeck SkillIDFromText(cardtext) Populate_Handlist LogThis cardtext & " UNDEALT from the hand of " & GetPlayerName(player) end sub 'UndealSkill
sub ShuffleSkill dim rtncd, SkillID, curcol, currow, destoffset as integer dim tmplst() as string
GetSF tmplst = SkillForm.getByName("lstSkillDecks").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a skill deck to shuffle." exit sub end if
SkillID = val(tmplst(0))
rtncd = MsgBox("Reshuffle the " & skillname(SkillID) & " Deck?",4)
if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
CompressSkillCards _SkillSetDeck, SkillID ShuffleASkillDeck SkillID end sub 'ShuffleSkill
function IsPlayerDestiny (playerID as integer) as BOOLEAN IsPlayerDestiny = (SkillForm.getByName("lstPlayers").StringItemList(playerID) = "*** DESTINY ***") end function
sub Populate_HandList dim tmplst() as string dim handlist(22) as string dim player, cardno as integer
GetSF player = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if player = -1 then exit sub end if
if IsPlayerDestiny(player) then player = _DestinyPlayerID end if
EnableCardButtons FALSE
SkillForm.getByName("lstPlyrHand").StringItemList=g_emptylst() if HandCardCnt (player) = 0 then Exit sub end if
for cardno = 1 to HandCardCnt(player) handlist(cardno) = CardInHand(player, cardNo, TRUE) next cardno SkillForm.getByName("lstPlyrHand").StringItemList = handlist() PopulateGiveCardPlayers player end sub 'Populate_Handlist
sub EnableCardButtons(enableflag as boolean) GetSF SkillForm.getByName("btnDiscardCard").enabled = enableflag SkillForm.getByName("btnPlayCard").enabled = enableflag SkillForm.getByName("btnGiveCard").enabled = enableflag end sub
sub CardSelected if IsPlayerDestiny(GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers)) then EnableCardButtons FALSE GetSF SkillForm.getByName("btnDiscardCard").enabled = TRUE else EnableCardButtons TRUE end if end sub
sub DiscardFromHand dim player, srccol, srcrow, cardno, rtncd as integer dim cardtext, tmplst() as string
GetSF player = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if player = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
if IsPlayerDestiny(player) then player = _DestinyPlayerID end if
if GetPlayerName(player) <> "Apollo" or IsRevealed(player) then cardNo = GetSelected(_ListSkillCards) if cardNo = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a card to discard." exit sub end if else rtncd = MsgBox ("Should this discard for Apollo be random? (Headstrong)",4) if rtncd = 6 then cardno= Int(RND()* HandCardCnt(player))+1 Msgbox "Apollo will discard: " & CardInHand(player,cardno,TRUE) else cardNo= GetSelected(_ListSkillCards) if cardNo = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a card to discard." exit sub end if end if end if
if player = _DestinyPlayerID then cardtext = SkillForm.getByName("lstPlyrHand").StringItemList(cardNo) DiscardFromDestiny cardtext
' Treacherous Destiny elseif VariantTreacherousDestiny() and (IsInfiltrating(player) or not IsRevealed(player)) and (SkillIDFromText(CardInHand(player,cardNo)) = _SkillIDTreachery) then ' Log MsgBox CardInHand(player, cardno) & " has been sent to Destiny." LogThis GetPlayerName(player) & " DISCARDED " & CardInHand(player, cardno) & " to Destiny."
'Place the card into Destiny, then shuffle Destiny AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDestiny, GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetHand, player, cardNo) CompressSkillCards _SkillSetDestiny, 0 ShuffleASkillDeck _SkillIDDestiny
'Clean up the player's hand CompressSkillCards _SkillSetHand, player Populate_Handlist else RemoveFromHand player, cardno, FALSE end if end sub 'DiscardFromHand
sub GetSkillType() as string GetSkillType = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckValueCol + 3, _SkillCheckHeaderRow).string end sub
sub GetSkillFlag (flag as string) as boolean dim row, col as integer row = _SkillCheckFlagsRow GetSF
select case flag case "Committee" col = _SkillCheckCommitteeCol
case "Reckless" col = _SkillCheckRecklessCol
case "Inspirational" col = _SkillCheckInspirationalCol row = row + 1
case "Guts" col = _SkillCheckGutsCol row = row + 1
case "Order" col = _SkillCheckOrderCol
case "Chance" col = _SkillCheckChanceCol
end select if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(col, row).string <> "" then GetSkillFlag = TRUE else GetSkillFlag = FALSE end if
end sub
sub SetSkillFlag (flag as string, optional state as boolean) dim whichcol, whichrow as integer dim whichtxt as string
whichrow = _SkillCheckFlagsRow select case flag case "Committee" whichcol = _SkillCheckCommitteeCol whichtxt = "IC"
case "Reckless" whichcol = _SkillCheckRecklessCol whichtxt = "Rkls"
case "Inspirational" whichcol = _SkillCheckInspirationalCol whichrow = whichrow + 1 whichtxt = "Insp"
case "Guts" whichcol = _SkillCheckGutsCol whichrow = whichrow + 1 whichtxt = "Guts"
case "Order" whichcol = _SkillCheckOrderCol whichtxt = "Order"
case "Chance" whichcol = _SkillCheckChanceCol whichtxt = "Chance"
end select if IsMissing(state) then state = TRUE end if
if NOT state then whichtxt = "" end if
SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(whichcol, whichrow).string = whichtxt end sub
sub SetSkillTrigger (flag as string, optional state as boolean) dim whichcol as integer dim bgclr as variant
if flag = "RECKLESS" then whichcol = _SkillCheckTriggerRecklessCol else whichcol = _SkillCheckTriggerConsequenceCol end if
if IsMissing(state) then state = TRUE end if
if state then bgclr = _red else flag = "" bgclr = _bluegrey end if
SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(whichcol,_SkillCheckTriggeredRow).string = flag SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(whichcol,_SkillCheckTriggeredRow).CellBackColor = bgclr end sub
sub PlayFromHand dim player, srccol, srcrow, cardno as integer dim tmplst() as string
GetSF
player = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if player = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
cardNo = GetSelected(_ListSkillCards) if cardNo = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a card to play." exit sub end if
if GetSkillType = "Mission" then MsgBox("You can't play cards on a Mission Skill Check") exit sub end if
'lets do some special checks here for specific cards... '+== revisit these, right now we're playing them always, do we need to add the IsSkillCheckClear() back in? select case SkillCardFromText(CardInHand(player,cardNo)) case "Investigative Committee" SetSkillFlag "Committee"
case "Scientific Research" 'if we're playing a scientific research during a skill check, set the appropriate flag SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckResearchCol,_SkillCheckHeaderRow).string = "X"
case "At Any Cost" 'if we're playing a at any cost during a skill check, set the appropriate flag SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckTreacheryCol,_SkillCheckHeaderRow).string = "X" SetSkillFlag "Reckless"
case "Jury Rigged" 'if we're playing a jury rigged during a skill check, reduce difficulty by 4 SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckValueCol,_SkillCheckHeaderRow).value = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(_SkillCheckValueCol,_SkillCheckHeaderRow).value-4 SetSkillFlag "Reckless"
case "Guts and Initiative" 'if we're playing a guts and initiative during a skill check, skip destiny SkillForm.getByName("btnSkillCheckFromDestiny").enabled = FALSE SkillForm.getByName("btnSkillCheckFromPlayer").enabled = TRUE SkillForm.getByName("btnSkillCheckClear").enabled = TRUE SetSkillFlag "Reckless" SetSkillFlag "Guts"
case "Support the People" SetSkillFlag "Reckless"
case "God's Plan" 'if we're playing "God's Plan" Treachery card, swap it with the top of destiny. GodsPlan player, cardNo exit sub 'GodsPlan removes the card for us
case "Build Nuke" if Not AddNuke() then exit sub end if

' Called to transfer a card from one player to another. ' This could happen via: ' - Human Fleet (base): Cylon steals a card from a Human ' - Politically Adroit: Ellen gives a card to another player ' - Intimate: Six steals a random card from a another player. ' - Glimpse the Face of God: Leoben trades 1-2 cards with the top of Destiny ' in this case, first hit the "Glimpse" button which will put the top 2 of Destiny into Leoben's hand ' then "give" two cards back to destiny. sub GiveCard dim srcid, destid, cardno, skillID, rtncd as integer dim srccol, srcrow, destcol, destrow as integer dim destplayer, cardtext as string dim tmplst() as string
GetSF
srcid = GetSelected(_ListSkillPlayers) if srcid = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a player.",0,"Give Card" exit sub end if
cardNo = GetSelected(_ListSkillCards) if cardNo = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a card to give.",0,"Give Card" exit sub end if
tmplst = SkillForm.getByName("lstDestPlayer").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) < 0 then MsgBox "Please select a player to receive the card.",0,"Give Card" exit sub end if
destplayer = SkillForm.getByName("lstDestPlayer").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0)))
cardtext = CardInHand(srcID, cardNo, TRUE) rtncd = MsgBox("Transfer '" & cardtext & "' from " & GetPlayerName(srcid) & " to " & destplayer & "?" ,4,"Give Card") if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
destid = GetPlayerID(destplayer) 'destid=0 means we're give to Destiny
if destID = 0 then AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetDestiny, GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetHand, srcID, cardNo) else AddSkillCardTo _SkillSetHand, GetSkillCardFrom(_SkillSetHand, srcID, cardNo), destID for skillID = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDMax Skillsheet.getCellByPosition(GetPlayerCol(destID), _PlayerDrawnRow + skillID).string = "X" next skillID end if
LogThis destplayer & " receives " & cardtext & " from " & GetPlayerName(srcID)
CompressSkillCards _SkillSetHand, srcID Populate_Handlist end sub 'GiveCard
sub PopulateGiveCardPlayers (fromplayer as integer) dim playerlst(8) as string dim i, cntr as integer
cntr = 1 for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() if i <> fromplayer then playerlst(cntr) = GetPlayerName(i) cntr = cntr + 1 end if next i if GetPlayerName(fromplayer) = "Leoben" and GetCurrentPlayer() = fromplayer and SkillForm.getByName("btnGlimpse").enabled =FALSE then ' in other words...if it's Leoben's turn, and we've hit the "glimpse" button, and we've selected Leoben, then we can ' give the card to Destiny playerlst(cntr + 1) = "Destiny" cntr = cntr + 1 end if SkillForm.getByName("lstDestPlayer").StringItemList = playerlst() end sub

'whichset tells us if we're getting from a hand, deck, discard, or destiny ' need to investigate if we should support skill checks the same way, but they behave a little differently. ' setID is the player for _SkillSetHand sub AddSkillCardTo (whichset as integer, cardtxt as string, optional setID as integer) dim destcol, destrow, skillID as integer
skillID = SkillIDFromText(cardtxt) if IsMissing(setID) then setID = skillID end if
destcol = GetSkillSetCol(whichset, setID) destrow = GetSkillSetRow(whichset)
do if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(destcol,destrow).string = "" then 'found the first empty cell SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(destcol,destrow).string = cardtxt SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(destcol,destrow).charColor = SkillColorDisp(skillID) exit do end if destrow = destrow + 1 loop
end sub 'AddSkillCardTo
'whichset tells us if we're getting from a hand, deck, discard, or destiny ' setID is the player for hand or skill for deck and discard; ignored for destiny ' cardno is only used for hands, otherwise we'll always be taking the top card. ' 'Note: this will NOT compress the deck...that's a separate call so that if we're pulling multiple cards we don't waste too much effort
function GetSkillCardFrom (whichset as integer, optional setID as integer, optional cardno as integer) as string dim srccol, srcrow, maxcnt as integer
srccol = GetSkillSetCol(whichset, setID) srcrow = GetSkillSetRow(whichset)
if IsMissing(cardno) then maxcnt = MaxCardCnt(whichset) 'take from the top of the deck GetSkillCardFrom = "" for cardno = 0 to maxcnt if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + cardno).string <> "" then GetSkillCardFrom = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + cardno).string SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + cardno).string = "" exit for end if next cardno else GetSkillCardFrom = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + cardno - 1).string SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + cardno - 1).string = "" end if end function 'GetSkillCardFrom
sub CompressSkillCards (whichset as integer, setID as integer) dim srccol, srcrow, firstempty, maxcnt, i as integer
GetSF
srccol = GetSkillSetCol(whichset, setID) srcrow = GetSkillSetRow(whichset)
firstempty = -1 maxcnt = MaxCardCnt(whichset) for i = 0 to maxcnt if SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + i).string = "" and firstempty = -1 then firstempty = srcrow + i elseif SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + i).string <> "" and firstempty <> -1 then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,firstempty).string = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + i).string SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,firstempty).CharColor = SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + i).CharColor SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(srccol,srcrow + i).string = "" firstempty = firstempty + 1 end if next i
end sub 'CompressSkillCards
